bioconda.name: kaiju
bioconda.summary: Fast and sensitive taxonomic classification for metagenomics.

biocontainers.name: kaiju
biocontainers.summary: Fast and sensitive taxonomic classification for metagenomics

biotools.summary: Program for the taxonomic assignment of high-throughput sequencing reads, e.g., Illumina or Roche/454, from whole-genome sequencing of metagenomic DNA. Reads are directly assigned to taxa using the NCBI taxonomy and a reference database of protein sequences from Bacteria, Archaea, Fungi, microbial eukaryotes and viruses.
